metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12740 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: tcprewrite in Tcpreplay through 4.3.2 has a heap-based buffer over-read during a get_c operation. The issue is being triggered in the function get_ipv6_next() at common/get.c.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.3-2').
